    宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">    </span><span style="font-size:
    9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:
    Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">在</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> Unix </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;
    mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">上写程式的人大概都碰过</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:
    "Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">

    Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">，尤其是用</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> C </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;
    mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">来开发程式的人。用</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:
    "Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> make</span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;
    mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">来开发和编译程式的确很方便，可是要写出一个</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;
    font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt"> Makefile</span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;
    mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:
    宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">就不简单了。偏偏介绍</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
    宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> Makefile </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;
    font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">的文件不多，</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">GNU Make </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;
    mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">那份印出来要几百页的文件，光看完</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;

    0pt"> Overview </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;

    宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">就快阵亡了，难怪许多</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
    宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><br>
    </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
    Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:

    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> Unix </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;
    mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">色变。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> <o:p></o:p></span></p>
    <p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
    宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">    </span><span style="font-size:
    9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:
    Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">本文将介绍如何利用</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> GNU Autoconf </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;
    mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">及</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> Automake </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;
    mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">这两套软体来协助我们『自动』产生</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;
    font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt"> Makefile </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;
    mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:
    宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">档，并且让开发出来的软体可以像</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
    宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> Apache, MySQL </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;
    font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">和常见的</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
    宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> GNU </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;
    font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">软体一样，只要会</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> ``./configure'', ``make'',
    ``make install'' </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;
    mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:
    宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">就可以把程式安装到系统中。如果您有</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
    宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><br>
    </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
    Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">心开发</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;

    0pt">基本构造虽然简单，但是妥善运用这些规则就也可以变出许多不同的花招。却也因此，许多刚开始学习写</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:

    </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:

    9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt"> GNU </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
    Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:

    font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:Verdana;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt"> -O </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:

    0pt">编译选项</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><br>
    With `-O', the compiler tries to reduce code size and execution time.<br>
    When you specify `-O', the two options `-fthread-jumps' and<br>
    `-fdefer-pop' are turned  on<br>

    0pt">优化，减少代码大小和执行的时间</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;
    font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt"><br>

    [alert7@redhat62 alert7]$ wc -c test<br>
      11757 test<br>
    [alert7@redhat62 alert7]$ gdb -q test<br>
    (gdb) disass main<br>
    Dump of assembler code for function main:<br>
    0x80483d8 :       push   %ebp<br>

    0x80483db :     call   0x80483c8<br>
    0x80483e0 :     xor    %eax,%eax<br>
    0x80483e2 :    leave<br>
    0x80483e3 :    ret<br>
    0x80483e4 :    nop<br>
    ...<br>
    End of assembler dump.<br>

    0x80483c8 :        push   %ebp<br>

    0x80483d0 :       call   0x8048308<br>
    0x80483d5 :      leave<br>
    0x80483d6 :      ret<br>

    End of assembler dump. <o:p></o:p></span></p>

        leave</span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:
    宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:
    宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">指令所做的操作相当于把</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
    宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">MOV ESP,EBP </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;
    font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">然后</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
    宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> POP EBP</span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;
    font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">。看到</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
    宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">leave</span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;
    font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">指令操作了没有，先把</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">ebp-->esp</span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;
    mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">，再</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">pop ebp</span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;
    mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">，这样即使在过程内堆栈的</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:
    "Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">esp,ebp</span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;
    mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">是不平衡的，但只要返回时候碰到</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;
    font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">leave</span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
    Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">指令就会平衡了，所以把</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:
    "Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">add
    $0x4,%esp</span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
    Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">优化掉也是没有问题的。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:
    "Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> <o:p></o:p></span></p>
    <div class="MsoNormal" align="center" style="text-align:center;mso-pagination:
    widow-orphan"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;color:blue;mso-font-kerning:0pt">
    <hr size="2" width="100%" align="center">
    </span></div>
    <p class="MsoNormal" align="center" style="text-align:center;mso-pagination:
    widow-orphan"><b><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:
    12.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">-O2 </span></b><b><span style="font-size:18.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:
    12.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:
    Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">编译选项</span></b><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>
    <p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><br>
    </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-bidi-font-family:
    宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">★</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;
    font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:Verdana;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt"> -O2 </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
    Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">编译选项</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><br>
    -O2<br>
        Optimize  even more.  Nearly all supported
    optimizations that do<br>
        not involve a space-speed tradeoff are performed. 
    Loop unrolling<br>
        and function inlining are not done, for example. 
    As compared to -O,<br>
        this option increases both compilation time and the
    performance of<br>
        the generated code.<br>
    [alert7@redhat62 alert7]$ gcc -O2 -o test test.c<br>
    [alert7@redhat62 alert7]$ wc -c test<br>
      11757 test<br>
    [alert7@redhat62 alert7]$ gdb -q test<br>
    (gdb) disass main<br>
    Dump of assembler code for function main:<br>
    0x80483d8 :       push   %ebp<br>
    0x80483d9 :     mov    %esp,%ebp<br>
    0x80483db :     call   0x80483c8<br>
    0x80483e0 :     xor    %eax,%eax<br>
    0x80483e2 :    leave<br>
    0x80483e3 :    ret<br>
    ...<br>
    0x80483ef :    nop<br>
    End of assembler dump.<br>
    (gdb) disass hi<br>
    Dump of assembler code for function hi:<br>
    0x80483c8 :        push   %ebp<br>
    0x80483c9 :       mov   
    %esp,%ebp<br>
    0x80483cb :       push   $0x8048440<br>
    0x80483d0 :       call   0x8048308<br>
    0x80483d5 :      leave<br>
    0x80483d6 :      ret<br>
    0x80483d7 :      nop<br>
    End of assembler dump.<br>
    </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
    Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">由于程序比较简单，再优化也没有好优化的了，所以跟</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;
    font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">-O</span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
    Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">出来的一样。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> <o:p></o:p></span></p>
    <div class="MsoNormal" align="center" style="text-align:center;mso-pagination:
    widow-orphan"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;color:blue;mso-font-kerning:0pt">
    <hr size="2" width="100%" align="center">
    </span></div>
    <p class="MsoNormal" align="center" style="text-align:center;mso-pagination:
    widow-orphan"><b><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:
    12.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">-fomit-frame-pointer </span></b><b><span style="font-size:18.0pt;
    mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;
    mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">编译选项</span></b><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:
    "Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>
    <p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><br>
    </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-bidi-font-family:
    宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">★</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;
    font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:Verdana;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt"> -fomit-frame-pointer </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:
    宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:
    宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">编译选项</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;
    font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt"><br>
    -fomit-frame-pointer<br>
                 
    Don't keep the frame pointer in a register for functions<br>
              that don't need
    one.  This avoids the  instructions to save,<br>
              set up and restore
    frame pointers; it also makes an extra<br>
              register available
    in many functions.  It also makes<br>
              debugging impossible
    on most machines. <o:p></o:p></span></p>
    <p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
    宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">    </span><span style="font-size:
    9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:
    Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">忽略帧指针。这样在程序就不需要保存，安装，和恢复</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">ebp</span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;
    mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">了。这样</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">ebp</span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;
    mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">也就是一个</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">free</span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;
    mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">的</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">register</span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;
    mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">了，在函数中就可以随便使用了。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;
    font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt"> <o:p></o:p></span></p>
    <p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
    宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">[alert7@redhat62 alert7]$ gcc -fomit-frame-pointer

    End of assembler dump.<br>
    </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
    Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">在</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">main()</span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;

    "Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><br>

    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><br>

    9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:
    Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">如果有多行汇编，则每一行都要加上　</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;

    9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:
    Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">实际上</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;

    mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:

    0pt">打印</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">"</span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;

    asm("xorl %ebx,%edx");<br>

    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">edx</span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;

    0pt">的值，但是由于</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:
    "Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">gcc</span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;
    mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">的特殊的处理方法，即先形成汇编文件，再交给</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;
    font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">GAS</span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
    Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">去汇编，所以</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">GAS</span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;
    mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">并不知道我们已经改变了</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:
    "Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">edx</span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;
    mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">和</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">ebx</span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;
    mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">的值，如果程序的上下文需要</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;
    font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">edx</span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:

    0pt">或</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;

    mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">作暂存，这样就会引起严重的后果．对于变量</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;
    font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">_booga</span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:

    0pt">也存在一样的问题．为了解决这个问题，就要用到扩展的行内汇编语法．</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:

    Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">三　扩展的行内汇编</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> <o:p></o:p></span></p>

    宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">    </span><span style="font-size:
    9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:
    Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">扩展的行内汇编类似于</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">Watcom. <o:p></o:p></span></p>
    <p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
    宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">    </span><span style="font-size:
    9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:
    Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">基本的格式是：</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><br>
    asm ( "statements" : output_regs : input_regs : clobbered_regs);<br>
    clobbered_regs</span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;
    mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:
    宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">指的是被改变的寄存器．</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
    宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> <o:p></o:p></span></p>
    <p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span style="font-size:
    9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:
    Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">下面是一个例子</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">(</span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;
    mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">为方便起见，我使用全局变量）：</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;
    font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt"> <o:p></o:p></span></p>
    <p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
    宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">int count=1;<br>
    int value=1;<br>
    int buf[10];<br>
    void main()<br>
    {<br>
    asm(<br>
    "cld \n\t"<br>
    "rep \n\t"<br>
    "stosl"<br>
    :<br>
    : "c" (count), "a" (value) , "D" (buf[0])<br>
    : "%ecx","%edi" );<br>
    } <o:p></o:p></span></p>
    <p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span style="font-size:
    9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:
    Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">得到的主要汇编代码为：</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> <o:p></o:p></span></p>
    <p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
    宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">movl count,%ecx<br>
    movl value,%eax<br>
    movl buf,%edi<br>
    #APP<br>
    cld<br>
    rep<br>
    stosl<br>
    #NO_APP <o:p></o:p></span></p>
    <p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
    宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">    cld,rep,stos</span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;
    mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">就不用多解释了．这几条语句的功能是向</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;
    font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">buf</span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
    Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">中写上</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">count</span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;
    mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">个</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">value</span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;
    mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">值．冒号后的语句指明输入，输出和被改变的寄存器．通过冒号以后的语句，编译器就知道你的指令需要和改变哪些寄存器，从而可以优化寄存器的分配．</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><br>
        </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;
    mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:
    宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">其中符号</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;
    font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">"c"(count)</span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:
    宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:
    宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">指示要把</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;
    font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">count</span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
    Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">的值放入</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">ecx</span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;
    mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">寄存器</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> <o:p></o:p></span></p>
    <p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span style="font-size:
    9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:
    Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">类似的还有：</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> <o:p></o:p></span></p>
    <p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
    宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">a eax<br>
    b ebx<br>
    c ecx<br>
    d edx<br>
    S esi<br>
    D edi<br>
    I </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:

    0pt">常数值，</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">(0 - 31)<br>
    q,r </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
    Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">动态分配的寄存器</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:
    "Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><br>
    g eax,ebx,ecx,edx</span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;
    mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:
    宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">或内存变量</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:
    9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt"><br>
    A </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
    Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">把</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">eax</span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;
    mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">和</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">edx</span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;
    mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">合成一个</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">64</span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;
    mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">位的寄存器</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">(use long longs) <o:p></o:p></span></p>
    <p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span style="font-size:
    9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:
    Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">我们也可以让</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">gcc</span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;
    mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">自己选择合适的寄存器．</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:
    "Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><br>
    </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
    Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">如下面的例子：</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:
    "Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><br>
    asm("leal (%1,%1,4),%0"<br>
    : "=r" (x)<br>
    : "0" (x) ); <o:p></o:p></span></p>
    <p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span style="font-size:
    9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:
    Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">这段代码实现</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">5*x</span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;
    mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">的快速乘法．</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><br>
    </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
    Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">得到的主要汇编代码为：</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:
    "Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><br>
    movl x,%eax<br>
    #APP<br>
    leal (%eax,%eax,4),%eax<br>
    #NO_APP<br>
    movl %eax,x <o:p></o:p></span></p>
    <p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span style="font-size:
    9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:
    Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">几点说明：</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> <o:p></o:p></span></p>
    <p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
    宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">1.</span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:
    宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:
    宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">使用</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;
    font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">q</span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
    Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">指示编译器从</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">eax,ebx,ecx,edx</span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;
    mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">分配寄存器．使用</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:
    "Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">r</span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;
    mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">指示编译器从</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">eax,ebx,ecx,edx,esi,edi</span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;
    mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">分配寄存器．</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> <o:p></o:p></span></p>
    <p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
    宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">2.</span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:
    宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:
    宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">我们不必把编译器分配的寄存器放入改变的寄存器列表，因为寄存器已经记住了它们．</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> <o:p></o:p></span></p>
    <p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
    宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">3."="</span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;
    font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">是标示输出寄存器，必须这样用．</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> <o:p></o:p></span></p>
    <p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
    宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">4.</span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:

    宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">数字</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;
    font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">%n</span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
    Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">的用法：</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> <o:p></o:p></span></p>
    <p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
    宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">    </span><span style="font-size:
    9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:
    Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">数字表示的寄存器是按照出现和从左到右的顺序映射到用</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">"r"</span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;
    mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">或</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">"q"</span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;
    mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">请求的寄存器．如果我们要重用</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;
    font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">"r"</span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;
    mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:
    宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">或</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;
    font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">"q"</span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;
    mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:
    宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">请求的寄存器的话，就可以使用它们．</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
    宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> <o:p></o:p></span></p>
    <p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
    宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">5.</span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:
    宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:
    宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">如果强制使用固定的寄存器的话，如不用</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
    宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">%1,</span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:
    宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:
    宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">而用</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;
    font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">ebx,</span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
    Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">则</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">asm("leal
    (%%ebx,%%ebx,4),%0" <o:p></o:p></span></p>
    <p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
    宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">: "=r" (x)<br>
    : "0" (x) ); <o:p></o:p></span></p>
    <p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span style="font-size:
    9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:
    Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">注意要使用两个</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">%,</span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;
    mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">因为一个</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">%</span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;
    mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">的语法已经被</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">%n</span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;
    mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">用掉了．</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> <o:p></o:p></span></p>
    <p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span style="font-size:
    9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:
    Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">下面可以来解释</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">letter 4854-4855</span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;
    mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">的问题：</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> <o:p></o:p></span></p>
    <p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
    宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><br>
    1</span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
    Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">、变量加下划线和双下划线有什么特殊含义吗？</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;
    font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt"><br>
        </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;
    mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:
    宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">加下划线是指全局变量，但我的</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
    宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">gcc</span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:
    宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:
    宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">中加不加都无所谓．</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:
    9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt"> <o:p></o:p></span></p>
    <p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
    宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">2</span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:
    宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:
    宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">、以上定义用如下调用时展开会是什么意思？</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
    宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><br>
    #define _syscall1(type,name,type1,arg1) \<br>
    type name(type1 arg1) \<br>
    { \<br>
    long __res; \<br>
    /* __res</span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
    Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">应该是一个全局变量　</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:
    "Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">*/<br>
    __asm__ volatile ("int $0x80" \<br>
    /* volatile </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
    Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">的意思是不允许优化，使编译器严格按照你的汇编代码汇编</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:
    9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">*/<br>
    : "=a" (__res) \<br>
    /* </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
    Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">产生代码　</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">movl %eax, __res */<br>
    : "0" (__NR_##name),"b" ((long)(arg1))); \<br>
    /* </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
    Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">如果我没记错的话，这里</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:
    "Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">##</span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;
    mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">指的是两次宏展开．</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:
    "Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><br>
    </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
    Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">　　即用实际的系统调用名字代替</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;
    font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">"name",</span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;
    mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:
    宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">然后再把</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;
    font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">__NR_...</span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
    Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">展开．</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><br>
    </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
    Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">　　接着把展开的常数放入</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:
    "Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">eax</span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;
    mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">，把</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">arg1</span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;
    mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">放入</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">ebx */<br>
    if (__res >= 0) \<br>
    return (type) __res; \<br>
    errno = -__res; \<br>
    return -1; \<br>
    } <o:p></o:p></span></p>

    widow-orphan"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;

    <p class="MsoNormal" align="center" style="text-align:center;mso-pagination:
    widow-orphan"><b><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:
    12.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">x86</span></b><b><span style="font-size:18.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:
    12.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:
    Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">内联汇编</span></b><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>
    <p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><br>
        </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;
    mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:
    宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">本文提供了在</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:
    9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt"> Linux </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
    Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">平台上使用和构造</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:
    "Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> x86 </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;
    mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">内联汇编的概括性介绍。他介绍了内联汇编及其各种用法的基础知识，提供了一些基本的内联汇编编码指导，并解释了在</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> Linux </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;
    mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">内核中内联汇编代码的一些实例。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;
    font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt"><br>
        </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;
    mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:
    宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">如果您是</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;
    font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt"> Linux </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
    Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">内核的开发人员，您会发现自己经常要对与体系结构高度相关的功能进行编码或优化代码路径。您很可能是通过将汇编语言指令插入到</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> C </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;
    mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">语句的中间（又称为内联汇编的一种方法）来执行这些任务的。让我们看一下</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
    宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> Linux </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;
    font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">中内联汇编的特定用法。（我们将讨论限制在</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> IA32 </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;
    mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">汇编。）</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> <o:p></o:p></span></p>
    <div class="MsoNormal" align="center" style="text-align:center;mso-pagination:
    widow-orphan"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;color:blue;mso-font-kerning:0pt">
    <hr size="2" width="100%" align="center">
    </span></div>
    <p class="MsoNormal" align="center" style="text-align:center;mso-pagination:
    widow-orphan"><b><span style="font-size:18.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;
    font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">简述</span></b><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>
    <p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><br>
    GNU </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
    Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">汇编程序简述</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><br>
        </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;
    mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:
    宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">让我们首先看一下</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:
    9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt"> Linux </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
    Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">中使用的基本汇编程序语法。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;
    font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">GCC</span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
    Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">（用于</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> Linux </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;
    mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">的</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> GNU C </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;
    mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">编译器）使用</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> AT&T </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;
    mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">汇编语法。下面列出了这种语法的一些基本规则。（该列表肯定不完整；只包括了与内联汇编相关的那些规则。）</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> <o:p></o:p></span></p>
    <p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span style="font-size:
    9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:
    Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">寄存器命名</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><br>
        </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;
    mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:
    宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">寄存器名称有</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:
    9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt"> % </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
    Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">前缀。即，如果必须使用</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:
    "Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> eax</span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;
    mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">，它应该用作</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> %eax</span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;
    mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> <o:p></o:p></span></p>
    <p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span style="font-size:
    9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:
    Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">源操作数和目的操作数的顺序</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><br>
        </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;
    mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:
    宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">在所有指令中，先是源操作数，然后才是目的操作数。这与将源操作数放在目的操作数之后的</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> Intel </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;
    mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">语法不同。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><br>
        mov %eax, %ebx, transfers the contents of eax to ebx. <o:p></o:p></span></p>
    <p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span style="font-size:
    9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:
    Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">操作数大小</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><br>
        </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;
    mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:
    宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">根据操作数是字节</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:
    9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt"> (byte)</span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
    Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">、字</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> (word) </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;
    mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">还是长型</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> (long)</span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;
    mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">，指令的后缀可以是</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:
    "Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> b</span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;
    mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">、</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">w </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;
    mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">或</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> l</span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;
    mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">。这并不是强制性的；</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:
    "Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">GCC </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;
    mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">会尝试通过读取操作数来提供相应的后缀。但手工指定后缀可以改善代码的可读性，并可以消除编译器猜测不正确的可能性。</span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
    宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> <span lang="EN-US"><o:p></o:p></span></span></p>
    <p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
    宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">    movb %al, %bl -- Byte move<br>
        movw %ax, %bx -- Word move<br>
        movl %eax, %ebx -- Longword move <o:p></o:p></span></p>
    <p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span style="font-size:
    9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:
    Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">立即操作数</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><br>
        </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;
    mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:
    宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">通过使用</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;
    font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt"> $ </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
    Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">指定直接操作数。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:
    "Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> <o:p></o:p></span></p>
    <p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
    宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">    movl $0xffff, %eax -- will move
    the value of 0xffff into eax register. <o:p></o:p></span></p>
    <p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span style="font-size:
    9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:
    Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">间接内存引用</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><br>
        </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;
    mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:
    宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">任何对内存的间接引用都是通过使用</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
    宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> ( ) </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;
    font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">来完成的。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
    宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> <o:p></o:p></span></p>
    <p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
    宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">    movb (%esi), %al -- will
    transfer the byte in the memory<br>
        pointed by esi into al register <o:p></o:p></span></p>
    <div class="MsoNormal" align="center" style="text-align:center;mso-pagination:
    widow-orphan"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;color:blue;mso-font-kerning:0pt">
    <hr size="2" width="100%" align="center">
    </span></div>
    <p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;color:blue;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> <o:p></o:p></span></p>
    <p class="MsoNormal" align="center" style="text-align:center;mso-pagination:
    widow-orphan"><a name="I209"></a><b><span style="font-size:18.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:
    12.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:
    Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">内联汇编</span></b><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>
    <p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><br>
    </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
    Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">内联汇编</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><br>
        GCC </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:
    宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:
    宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">为内联汇编提供特殊结构，它具有以下格式：</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
    宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><br>
        asm ( assembler template<br>
            : output
    operands              
    (optional)<br>
            : input
    operands               
    (optional)<br>
            : list of clobbered
    registers   (optional)<br>
            ); <o:p></o:p></span></p>
    <p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
    宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">    </span><span style="font-size:
    9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:
    Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">本例中，汇编程序模板由汇编指令组成。输入操作数是充当指令输入操作数使用的</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> C </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;
    mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">表达式。输出操作数是将对其执行汇编指令输出的</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;
    font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt"> C </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
    Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">表达式。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> <o:p></o:p></span></p>
    <p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
    宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">    </span><span style="font-size:
    9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:
    Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">内联汇编的重要性体现在它能够灵活操作，而且可以使其输出通过</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> C </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;
    mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">变量显示出来。因为它具有这种能力，所以</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;
    font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt"> "asm" </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;
    mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:
    宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">可以用作汇编指令和包含它的</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
    宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> C </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:
    宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:
    宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">程序之间的接口。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:
    9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt"> <o:p></o:p></span></p>
    <p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
    宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">    </span><span style="font-size:
    9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:
    Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">一个非常基本但很重要的区别在于简单内联汇编只包括指令，而扩展内联汇编包括操作数。要说明这一点，考虑以下示例：</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> <o:p></o:p></span></p>
    <p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span style="font-size:
    9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:
    Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">内联汇编的基本要素</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> <o:p></o:p></span></p>
    <p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
    宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">{<br>
        int a=10, b;<br>
        asm ("movl %1, %%eax;<br>
              movl %%eax,
    %0;"<br>
             
    :"=r"(b)  /* output */<br>
             
    :"r"(a)       /* input */<br>
             :"%eax"); /*
    clobbered register */<br>
    } <o:p></o:p></span></p>
    <p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
    宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">    </span><span style="font-size:
    9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:
    Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">在上例中，我们使用汇编指令使</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> "b" </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;
    mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">的值等于</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> "a"</span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;
    mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">。请注意以下几点：</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:
    "Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><br>
        "b" </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;
    font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">是输出操作数，由</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> %0 </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;
    mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">引用，</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">"a" </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;
    mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">是输入操作数，由</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:
    "Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> %1 </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;
    mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">引用。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><br>
        "r" </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;
    font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">是操作数的约束，它指定将变量</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> "a" </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;
    mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">和</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> "b" </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;
    mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">存储在寄存器中。请注意，输出操作数约束应该带有一个约束修饰符</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
    宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> "="</span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;
    font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">，指定它是输出操作数。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><br>
        </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;
    mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:
    宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">要在</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;
    font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt"> "asm" </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;
    mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:
    宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">内使用寄存器</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:
    9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt"> %eax</span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
    Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">，</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">%eax </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;
    mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">的前面应该再加一个</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:
    "Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> %</span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;
    mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">，换句话说就是</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:
    "Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> %%eax</span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;
    mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">，因为</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> "asm" </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;
    mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">使用</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> %0</span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;
    mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">、</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">%1 </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;
    mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">等来标识变量。任何带有一个</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;
    font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt"> % </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
    Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">的数都看作是输入／输出操作数，而不认为是寄存器。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;
    font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt"><br>
    </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
    Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">第三个冒号后的修饰寄存器</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:
    "Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> %eax </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;
    mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">告诉将在</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> "asm" </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;
    mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">中修改</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> GCC %eax </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;
    mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">的值，这样</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> GCC </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;
    mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">就不使用该寄存器存储任何其它的值。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;
    font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt"><br>
        movl %1, %%eax </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;
    font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">将</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
    宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> "a" </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;
    font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">的值移到</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
    宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> %eax </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;
    font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">中，</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
    宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">movl %%eax, %0 </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;
    font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">将</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
    宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> %eax </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;
    font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">的内容移到</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
    宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> "b" </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;
    font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">中。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
    宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><br>
    </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
    Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">因为</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> "b" </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;
