    mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">被指定成输出操作数，因此当</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;
    font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt"> "asm" </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;
    mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:
    宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">的执行完成后，它将反映出更新的值。换句话说，对</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
    宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> "asm" </span><span style="font-size:
    9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:
    Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">内</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> "b" </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;
    mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">所做的更改将在</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:
    "Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">
    "asm" </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;
    mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:
    宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">外反映出来。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:
    9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt"> <o:p></o:p></span></p>
    <div class="MsoNormal" align="center" style="text-align:center;mso-pagination:
    widow-orphan"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;color:blue;mso-font-kerning:0pt">
    <hr size="2" width="100%" align="center">
    </span></div>
    <p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;color:blue;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> <o:p></o:p></span></p>
    <p class="MsoNormal" align="center" style="text-align:center;mso-pagination:
    widow-orphan"><a name="I210"></a><b><span style="font-size:18.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:
    12.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:
    Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">程序模板</span></b><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>
    <p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><br>
        </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;
    mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:
    宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">汇编程序模板是一组插入到</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
    宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> C </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:
    宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:
    宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">程序中的汇编指令（可以是单个指令，也可以是一组指令）。每条指令都应该由双引号括起，或者整组指令应该由双引号括起。每条指令还应该用一个定界符结尾。有效的定界符为新行</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> (\n) </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;
    mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">和分号</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> (;)</span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;
    mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> '\n' </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;
    mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">后可以跟一个</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> tab(\t) </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;
    mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">作为格式化符号，增加</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:
    "Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> GCC </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;
    mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">在汇编文件中生成的指令的可读性。</span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;
    mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">指令通过数</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> %0</span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;
    mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">、</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">%1 </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;
    mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">等来引用</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> C </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;
    mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">表达式（指定为操作数）。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:
    "Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> <o:p></o:p></span></p>
    <p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
    宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">    </span><span style="font-size:
    9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:
    Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">如果希望确保编译器不会在</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> "asm" </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;
    mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">内部优化指令，可以在</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:
    "Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">
    "asm" </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;
    mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:
    宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">后使用关键字</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:
    9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt"> "volatile"</span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:
    宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:
    宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">。如果程序必须与</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:
    9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt"> ANSI C </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
    Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">兼容，则应该使用</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:
    "Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> __asm__
    </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
    Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">和</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> __volatile__</span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;
    mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">，而不是</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> asm </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;
    mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">和</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> volatile</span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;
    mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> <o:p></o:p></span></p>
    <div class="MsoNormal" align="center" style="text-align:center;mso-pagination:
    widow-orphan"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;color:blue;mso-font-kerning:0pt">
    <hr size="2" width="100%" align="center">
    </span></div>
    <p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;color:blue;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> <o:p></o:p></span></p>
    <p class="MsoNormal" align="center" style="text-align:center;mso-pagination:
    widow-orphan"><a name="I211"></a><b><span style="font-size:18.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:
    12.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:
    Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">操作数</span></b><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>
    <p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><br>
       C </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;
    mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:
    宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">表达式用作</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:
    9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt"> "asm" </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;
    mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:
    宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">内的汇编指令操作数。在汇编指令通过对</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
    宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> C </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:
    宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:
    宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">程序的</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;
    font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt"> C </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
    Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">表达式进行操作来执行有意义的作业的情况下，操作数是内联汇编的主要特性。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
    宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> <o:p></o:p></span></p>
    <p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
    宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">    </span><span style="font-size:
    9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:
    Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">每个操作数都由操作数约束字符串指定，后面跟用括弧括起的</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> C </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;
    mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">表达式，例如：</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:
    "Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">"constraint"
    (C expression)</span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;
    mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:
    宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">。操作数约束的主要功能是确定操作数的寻址方式。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
    宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> <o:p></o:p></span></p>
    <p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
    宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">    </span><span style="font-size:
    9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:
    Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">可以在输入和输出部分中同时使用多个操作数。每个操作数由逗号分隔开。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> <o:p></o:p></span></p>
    <p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
    宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">    </span><span style="font-size:
    9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:
    Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">在汇编程序模板内部，操作数由数字引用。如果总共有</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> n </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;
    mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">个操作数（包括输入和输出），那么第一个输出操作数的编号为</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:
    9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt"> 0</span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
    Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">，逐项递增，最后那个输入操作数的编号为</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;
    font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt"> n-1</span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
    Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">。总操作数的数目限制在</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:
    "Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> 10</span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;
    mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">，如果机器描述中任何指令模式中的最大操作数数目大于</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:
    9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt"> 10</span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
    Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">，则使用后者作为限制。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:
    "Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> <o:p></o:p></span></p>
    <div class="MsoNormal" align="center" style="text-align:center;mso-pagination:
    widow-orphan"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;color:blue;mso-font-kerning:0pt">
    <hr size="2" width="100%" align="center">
    </span></div>
    <p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;color:blue;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> <o:p></o:p></span></p>
    <p class="MsoNormal" align="center" style="text-align:center;mso-pagination:
    widow-orphan"><a name="I212"></a><b><span style="font-size:18.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:
    12.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:
    Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">修饰寄存器列表</span></b><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>
    <p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><br>
        </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;
    mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:
    宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">如果</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;
    font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt"> "asm" </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;
    mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:
    宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">中的指令指的是硬件寄存器，可以告诉</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
    宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> GCC </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;
    font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">我们将自己使用和修改它们。这样，</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">GCC </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;
    mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">就不会假设它装入到这些寄存器中的值是有效值。通常不需要将输入和输出寄存器列为</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
    宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> clobbered</span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;
    font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">，因为</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
    宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> GCC </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;
    font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">知道</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
    宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> "asm" </span><span style="font-size:
    9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:
    Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">使用它们（因为它们被明确指定为约束）。不过，如果指令使用任何其它的寄存器，无论是明确的还是隐含的（寄存器不在输入约束列表中出现，也不在输出约束列表中出现），寄存器都必须被指定为修饰列表。修饰寄存器列在第三个冒号之后，其名称被指定为字符串。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> <o:p></o:p></span></p>
    <p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
    宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">    </span><span style="font-size:
    9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:
    Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">至于关键字，如果指令以某些不可预知且不明确的方式修改了内存，则可能将</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> "memory" </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;
    mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">关键字添加到修饰寄存器列表中。这样就告诉</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;
    font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt"> GCC </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
    Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">不要在不同指令之间将内存值高速缓存在寄存器中。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;
    font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt"> <o:p></o:p></span></p>
    <div class="MsoNormal" align="center" style="text-align:center;mso-pagination:
    widow-orphan"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;color:blue;mso-font-kerning:0pt">
    <hr size="2" width="100%" align="center">
    </span></div>
    <p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;color:blue;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> <o:p></o:p></span></p>
    <p class="MsoNormal" align="center" style="text-align:center;mso-pagination:
    widow-orphan"><a name="I213"></a><b><span style="font-size:18.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:
    12.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:
    Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">操作数约束</span></b><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>
    <p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><br>
        </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;
    mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:
    宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">前面提到过，</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:
    9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">"asm" </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;
    mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:
    宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">中的每个操作数都应该由操作数约束字符串描述，后面跟用括弧括起的</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> C </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;
    mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">表达式。操作数约束主要是确定指令中操作数的寻址方式。约束也可以指定：</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
    宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> <o:p></o:p></span></p>
    <p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
    宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">    ·</span><span style="font-size:
    9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:
    Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">是否允许操作数位于寄存器中，以及它可以包括在哪些种类的寄存器中</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><br>
        ·</span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;
    mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:
    宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">操作数是否可以是内存引用，以及在这种情况下使用哪些种类的地址</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><br>
        ·</span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;
    mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:
    宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">操作数是否可以是立即数</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
    宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> <o:p></o:p></span></p>
    <p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span style="font-size:
    9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:
    Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">约束还要求两个操作数匹配。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> <o:p></o:p></span></p>
    <p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span style="font-size:
    9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:
    Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">常用约束</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> <o:p></o:p></span></p>
    <p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
    宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">    </span><span style="font-size:
    9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:
    Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">在可用的操作数约束中，只有一小部分是常用的；下面列出了这些约束以及简要描述。有关操作数约束的完整列表，请参考</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> GCC </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;
    mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">和</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> GAS </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;
    mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">手册。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> <o:p></o:p></span></p>
    <p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span style="font-size:
    9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:
    Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">寄存器操作数约束</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> (r)<br>
        </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;
    mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:
    宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">使用这种约束指定操作数时，它们存储在通用寄存器中。请看下例：</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><br>
               asm
    ("movl %%cr3, %0\n" :"=r"(cr3val));<br>
        </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;
    mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:
    宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">这里，变量</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:
    9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt"> cr3val </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
    Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">保存在寄存器中，</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:
    "Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">%cr3 </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;
    mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">的值复制到寄存器上，</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:
    "Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">cr3val </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;
    mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">的值从该寄存器更新到内存中。指定</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;
    font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt"> "r" </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;
    mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:
    宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">约束时，</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;
    font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">GCC </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
    Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">可以将变量</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> cr3val </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;
    mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">保存在任何可用的</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:
    "Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> GPR </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;
    mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">中。要指定寄存器，必须通过使用特定的寄存器约束直接指定寄存器名。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
    宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> <o:p></o:p></span></p>
    <p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
    宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">a   %eax<br>
    b   %ebx<br>
    c   %ecx<br>
    d   %edx<br>
    S   %esi<br>
    D   %edi <o:p></o:p></span></p>
    <p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span style="font-size:
    9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:
    Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">内存操作数约束</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> (m)<br>
        </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;
    mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:
    宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">当操作数位于内存中时，任何对它们执行的操作都将在内存位置中直接发生，这与寄存器约束正好相反，后者先将值存储在要修改的寄存器中，然后将它写回内存位置中。但寄存器约束通常只在对于指令来说它们是绝对必需的，或者它们可以大大提高进程速度时使用。当需要在</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> "asm" </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;
    mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">内部更新</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> C </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;
    mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">变量，而您又确实不希望使用寄存器来保存其值时，使用内存约束最为有效。例如，</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
    宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">idtr </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;
    font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">的值存储在内存位置</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> loc </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;
    mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">中：</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><br>
            ("sidt %0\n" :
    :"m"(loc)); <o:p></o:p></span></p>
    <p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span style="font-size:
    9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:
    Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">匹配（数字）约束</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><br>
        </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;
    mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:
    宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">在某些情况下，一个变量既要充当输入操作数，也要充当输出操作数。可以通过使用匹配约束在</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> "asm" </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;
    mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">中指定这种情况。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:
    "Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> <o:p></o:p></span></p>
    <p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
    宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">        asm
    ("incl %0" :"=a"(var):"0"(var)); <o:p></o:p></span></p>
    <p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
    宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">    </span><span style="font-size:
    9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:
    Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">在匹配约束的示例中，寄存器</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> %eax </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;
    mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">既用作输入变量，也用作输出变量。将</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;
    font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt"> var </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
    Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">输入读取到</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> %eax</span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;
    mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">，增加后将更新的</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:
    "Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> %eax </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;
    mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">再次存储在</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> var </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;
    mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">中。这里的</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> "0" </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;
    mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">指定第</span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> <span lang="EN-US">0 </span></span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;
    mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">个输出变量相同的约束。即，它指定</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;
    font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt"> var </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
    Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">的输出实例只应该存储在</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:
    "Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> %eax </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;
    mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">中。该约束可以用于以下情况：</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;
    font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt"> <o:p></o:p></span></p>
    <p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
    宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">   ·</span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;
    font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">输入从变量中读取，或者变量被修改后，修改写回到同一变量中</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><br>
       ·</span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;
    mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:
    宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">不需要将输入操作数和输出操作数的实例分开</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
    宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><br>
       ·</span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;
    mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:
    宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">使用匹配约束最重要的意义在于它们可以导致有效地使用可用寄存器。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> <o:p></o:p></span></p>
    <div class="MsoNormal" align="center" style="text-align:center;mso-pagination:
    widow-orphan"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;color:blue;mso-font-kerning:0pt">
    <hr size="2" width="100%" align="center">
    </span></div>
    <p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;color:blue;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> <o:p></o:p></span></p>
    <p class="MsoNormal" align="center" style="text-align:center;mso-pagination:
    widow-orphan"><a name="I214"></a><b><span style="font-size:18.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:
    12.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:
    Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">示例</span></b><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>
    <p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><br>
    </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
    Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">一般内联汇编用法示例</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:
    "Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><br>
        </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;
    mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:
    宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">以下示例通过各种不同的操作数约束说明了用法。有如此多的约束以至于无法将它们一一列出，这里只列出了最经常使用的那些约束类型。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> <o:p></o:p></span></p>
    <div class="MsoNormal" align="center" style="text-align:center;mso-pagination:
    widow-orphan"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;color:blue;mso-font-kerning:0pt">
    <hr size="2" width="100%" align="center">
    </span></div>
    <p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;color:blue;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> <o:p></o:p></span></p>
    <p class="MsoNormal" align="center" style="text-align:center;mso-pagination:
    widow-orphan"><a name="I215"></a><b><span style="font-size:18.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:
    12.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:
    Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">寄存器约束</span></b><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>
    <p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><br>
    "asm" </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;
    mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:
    宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">和寄存器约束</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:
    9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt"> "r"<br>
        </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;
    mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:
    宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">让我们先看一下使用寄存器约束</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
    宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> r </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:
    宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:
    宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">的</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;
    font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt"> "asm"</span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;
    mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:
    宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">。我们的示例显示了</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:
    9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt"> GCC </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
    Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">如何分配寄存器，以及它如何更新输出变量的值。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;
    font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt"> <o:p></o:p></span></p>
    <p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
    宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">int main(void)<br>
    {<br>
        int x = 10, y;<br>
        asm ("movl %1, %%eax;<br>
             "movl %%eax,
    %0;"<br>
             :"=r"(y) 
    /* y is output operand */<br>
            
    :"r"(x)       /* x is input operand
    */<br>
             :"%eax"); /*
    %eax is clobbered register */<br>
    } <o:p></o:p></span></p>
    <p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
    宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">    </span><span style="font-size:
    9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:
    Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">在该例中，</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">x </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;
    mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">的值复制为</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> "asm" </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;
    mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">中的</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> y</span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;
    mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">x </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;
    mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">和</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> y </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;
    mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">都通过存储在寄存器中传递给</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;
    font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt"> "asm"</span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;
    mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:
    宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">。为该例生成的汇编代码如下：</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
    宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> <o:p></o:p></span></p>
    <p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
    宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">main:<br>
    pushl %ebp<br>
    movl %esp,%ebp<br>
    subl $8,%esp<br>
    movl $10,-4(%ebp)<br>
    movl -4(%ebp),%edx  /* x=10 is stored in %edx */<br>
    #APP    /* asm starts here */<br>
    movl %edx, %eax     /* x is moved to %eax */<br>
    movl %eax, %edx     /* y is allocated in edx and
    updated */<br>
    #NO_APP /* asm ends here */<br>
    movl %edx,-8(%ebp)  /* value of y in stack is updated with the value
    in %edx */ <o:p></o:p></span></p>
    <p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
    宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">    </span><span style="font-size:
    9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:
    Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">当使用</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> "r" </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;
    mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">约束时，</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">GCC </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;
    mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">在这里可以自由分配任何寄存器。在我们的示例中，它选择</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:
    9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt"> %edx </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
    Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">来存储</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> x</span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;
    mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">。在读取了</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> %edx </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;
    mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">中</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> x </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;
    mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">的值后，它为</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> y </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;
    mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">也分配了相同的寄存器。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:
    "Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> <o:p></o:p></span></p>
    <p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
    宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">    </span><span style="font-size:
    9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:
    Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">因为</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> y </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;
    mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">是在输出操作数部分中指定的，所以</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;
    font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt"> %edx </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
    Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">中更新的值存储在</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:
    "Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">
    -8(%ebp)</span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
    Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">，堆栈上</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> y </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;
    mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">的位置中。如果</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:
    "Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> y </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;
    mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">是在输入部分中指定的，那么即使它在</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;
    font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt"> y </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
    Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">的临时寄存器存储值</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:
    "Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> (%edx) </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;
    mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">中被更新，堆栈上</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:
    "Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> y </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;
    mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">的值也不会更新。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:
    "Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> <o:p></o:p></span></p>
    <p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
    宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">    </span><span style="font-size:
    9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:
    Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">因为</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> %eax </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;
    mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">是在修饰列表中指定的，</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:
    "Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">GCC </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;
    mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">不在任何其它地方使用它来存储数据。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;
    font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt"> <o:p></o:p></span></p>
    <p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
    宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">    </span><span style="font-size:
    9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:
    Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">输入</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> x </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;
    mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">和输出</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> y </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;
    mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">都分配在同一个</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:
    "Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> %edx </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;
    mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">寄存器中，假设输入在输出产生之前被消耗。请注意，如果您有许多指令，就不是这种情况了。要确保输入和输出分配到不同的寄存器中，可以指定</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> & </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;
    mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">约束修饰符。下面是添加了约束修饰符的示例。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;
    font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt"> <o:p></o:p></span></p>
    <p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
    宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">int main(void)<br>
    {<br>
        int x = 10, y;<br>
        asm ("movl %1, %%eax;<br>
             "movl %%eax,
    %0;"<br>
            :"=&r"(y) /* y is
    output operand, note the & constraint modifier. */<br>
           
    :"r"(x)       /* x is input operand
    */<br>
            :"%eax"); /* %eax is
    clobbered register */<br>
    } <o:p></o:p></span></p>

    <p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:

    movl %edx,-4(%ebp)<br>
    %eax and %edx serve as outputs */<br>
    Note here that the values in %edx:%eax serve as 64 bit output. <o:p></o:p></span></p>

    <p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;color:blue;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> <o:p></o:p></span></p>
    <p class="MsoNormal" align="center" style="text-align:center;mso-pagination:
    widow-orphan"><a name="I216"></a><b><span style="font-size:18.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:
    12.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:
    Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">匹配约束</span></b><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>
    <p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><br>
    </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
    Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">使用匹配约束</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><br>
        </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;
    mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:
    宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">在下面将看到系统调用的代码，它有四个参数：</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
    宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> <o:p></o:p></span></p>
    <p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
    宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">#define _syscall4(type,name,type1,arg1,type2,arg2,type3,arg3,type4,arg4)
    \<br>
    type name (type1 arg1, type2 arg2, type3 arg3, type4 arg4) \<br>
    { \<br>
    long __res; \<br>
    __asm__ volatile ("int $0x80" \<br>
    : "=a" (__res) \<br>
    : "0" (__NR_##name),"b" ((long)(arg1)),"c"
    ((long)(arg2)), \<br>
    "d" ((long)(arg3)),"S" ((long)(arg4))); \<br>
    __syscall_return(type,__res); \<br>
    } <o:p></o:p></span></p>
    <p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
    宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">    </span><span style="font-size:
    9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:
    Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">在上例中，通过使用</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> b</span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;
    mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">、</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">c</span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;
    mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">、</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">d </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;
    mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">和</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> S </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;
    mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">约束将系统调用的四个自变量放入</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;
    font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt"> %ebx</span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
    Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">、</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">%ecx</span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;
    mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">、</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">%edx </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;
    mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">和</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> %esi </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;
    mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">中。请注意，在输出中使用了</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;
    font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt"> "=a" </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;
    mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:
    宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">约束，这样，位于</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:
    9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt"> %eax </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
    Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">中的系统调用的返回值就被放入变量</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;
    font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt"> __res </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
    Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">中。通过将匹配约束</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:
    "Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">
    "0" </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;
    mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:
    宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">用作输入部分中第一个操作数约束，</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
    宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">syscall </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;
    font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">号</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
    宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> __NR_##name </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;
    font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">被放入</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
    宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> %eax </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;
    font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">中，并用作对系统调用的输入。这样，这里的</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> %eax </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;
    mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">既可以用作输入寄存器，又可以用作输出寄存器。没有其它寄存器用于这个目的。另请注意，输入（</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
    宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">syscall </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;
    font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">号）在产生输出（</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">syscall </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;
    mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">的返回值）之前被消耗（使用）。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;
    font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt"> <o:p></o:p></span></p>

    <p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;color:blue;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> <o:p></o:p></span></p>
    <p class="MsoNormal" align="center" style="text-align:center;mso-pagination:
    widow-orphan"><a name="I217"></a><b><span style="font-size:18.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:
    12.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:
    Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">内存操作数约束</span></b><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>
    <p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><br>
    </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
    Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">内存操作数约束的使用</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:
    "Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><br>
        </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;
    mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:
    宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">请考虑下面的原子递减操作：</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
    宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> <o:p></o:p></span></p>
    <p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
    宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">        __asm__
    __volatile__(<br>
                   
    "lock; decl %0"<br>
                   
    :"=m" (counter)<br>
                   
    :"m" (counter)); <o:p></o:p></span></p>
    <p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
    宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">    </span><span style="font-size:
    9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:
    Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">为它生成的汇编类似于：</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> <o:p></o:p></span></p>
    <p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
    宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">#APP<br>
        lock<br>
        decl -24(%ebp) /* counter is modified on its memory
    location */<br>
    #NO_APP. <o:p></o:p></span></p>
    <p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
    宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">    </span><span style="font-size:
    9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:
    Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">您可能考虑在这里为</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> counter </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;
    mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">使用寄存器约束。如果这样做，</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;
    font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">counter </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
    Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">的值必须先复制到寄存器，递减，然后对其内存更新。但这样您会无法理解锁定和原子性的全部意图，这些明确显示了使用内存约束的必要性。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> <o:p></o:p></span></p>
    <div class="MsoNormal" align="center" style="text-align:center;mso-pagination:
    widow-orphan"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;color:blue;mso-font-kerning:0pt">
    <hr size="2" width="100%" align="center">
    </span></div>
    <p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;color:blue;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> <o:p></o:p></span></p>
    <p class="MsoNormal" align="center" style="text-align:center;mso-pagination:
    widow-orphan"><a name="I218"></a><b><span style="font-size:18.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:
    12.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:
    Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">修饰寄存器</span></b><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>
    <p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><br>
    </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
    Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">使用修饰寄存器</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:
    "Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><br>
        </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;
    mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:
    宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">请考虑内存拷贝的基本实现。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
    宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> <o:p></o:p></span></p>
    <p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
    宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">       asm
    ("movl $count, %%ecx;<br>
                up:
    lodsl;<br>
                stosl;<br>
                loop
    up;"<br>
               
    :           /* no output
    */<br>
               
    :"S"(src), "D"(dst) /* input */<br>
               
    :"%ecx", "%eax" );  /* clobbered list */ <o:p></o:p></span></p>
    <p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
    宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">    </span><span style="font-size:
    9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:
    Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">当</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> lodsl </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;
    mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">修改</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> %eax </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;
    mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">时，</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">lodsl </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;
    mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">和</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> stosl </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;
    mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">指令隐含地使用它。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:
    "Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">%ecx </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;
    mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">寄存器明确装入</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:
    "Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> count</span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;
    mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">。但</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> GCC </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;
    mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">在我们通知它以前是不知道这些的，我们是通过将</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;
    font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt"> %eax </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
    Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">和</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> %ecx </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;
    mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">包括在修饰寄存器集中来通知</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;
    font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt"> GCC </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
    Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">的。在完成这一步之前，</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:
    "Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">GCC </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;
    mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">假设</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> %eax </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;
    mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">和</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> %ecx </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;
    mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">是自由的，它可能决定将它们用作存储其它的数据。请注意，</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:
    9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">%esi </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
    Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">和</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> %edi </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;
    mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">由</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> "asm" </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;
    mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">使用，它们不在修饰列表中。这是因为已经声明</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;
    font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt"> "asm" </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;
    mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:
    宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">将在输入操作数列表中使用它们。这里最低限度是，如果在</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
    宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> "asm" </span><span style="font-size:
    9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:
    Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">内部使用寄存器（无论是明确还是隐含地），既不出现在输入操作数列表中，也不出现在输出操作数列表中，必须将它列为修饰寄存器。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> <o:p></o:p></span></p>

    宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">Note: do not use -march= <o:p></o:p></span></p>

    <p class="MsoNormal" align="center" style="text-align:center;mso-pagination:
