    12.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:
    Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">代码维护</span></b><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>
    <p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p> </o:p></span></p>
    <div class="MsoNormal" align="center" style="text-align:center;mso-pagination:
    widow-orphan"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;color:blue;mso-font-kerning:0pt">
    <hr size="2" width="100%" align="center">
    </span></div>
    <p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;color:blue;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> <o:p></o:p></span></p>
    <p class="MsoNormal" align="center" style="text-align:center;mso-pagination:
    widow-orphan"><a name="I344"></a><b><span style="font-size:18.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:
    12.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:
    Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">简单</span></b><b><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;mso-bidi-font-size:12.0pt;font-family:
    "Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">cvs</span></b><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>
    <p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><br>
    </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
    Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">简单</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">CVS<br>
    </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
    Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">一、所要解决的问题</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:
    "Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><br>
        </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;
    mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:
    宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">由于软件项目越来越大，也增加了软件项目管理的难度。在开发组中，每个成员都要保留一个副本，在开发中非常容易引起冲突。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">CVS </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;
    mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">就是为了解决这个问题的。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:
    "Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> <o:p></o:p></span></p>
    <p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
    宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">    a</span><span style="font-size:
    9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:
    Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">、修改同步，防止一名开发人员的修改覆盖其他人的成果。（</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">check out</span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;
    mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">、</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">read only</span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;
    mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">）</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> <o:p></o:p></span></p>
    <p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
    宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">    b</span><span style="font-size:
    9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:
    Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">、维护不同的版本。（按</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> version </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;
    mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">查找）</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> <o:p></o:p></span></p>
    <p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
    宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">    c</span><span style="font-size:
    9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:
    Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">、可查找历史记录。防止</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> bug </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;
    mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">的再引入。（</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">diff</span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;
    mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">）</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> <o:p></o:p></span></p>
    <p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
    宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">    CVS </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;
    mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">为了解决这个问题，采用的方式是：</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;
    font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt"> <o:p></o:p></span></p>
    <p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
    宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">    </span><span style="font-size:
    9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:
    Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">当开发人员对源代码进行修改时，修改的内容被登记（</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">check in</span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;
    mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">）到了</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> CVS </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;
    mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">仓库（</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">repository</span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;
    mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">）中。仓库中保存了代码的主控副本，以及历次修改的历史信息。它不保存文件的每个版本，而只是简单的记录发生在每个版本间的不同，节省磁盘空间。它能做到：</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> <o:p></o:p></span></p>
    <p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
    宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">    a</span><span style="font-size:
    9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:
    Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">、使开发人员的目录和仓库保持一致。可以把自己的修改提交（</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">commit</span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;
    mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">）给仓库，让仓库更新自己。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;
    font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt"> <o:p></o:p></span></p>
    <p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
    宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">    b</span><span style="font-size:
    9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:
    Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">、允许代码派生。可以进行测试，如果失败，可以消除所做的修改，维持原结果。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> <o:p></o:p></span></p>
    <p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
    宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">    c</span><span style="font-size:
    9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:
    Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">、检索任何一个版本。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> <o:p></o:p></span></p>
    <p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span style="font-size:
    9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:
    Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">二、使用</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> CVS</span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;
    mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">：</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> <o:p></o:p></span></p>
    <p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
    宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">    a</span><span style="font-size:
    9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:
    Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">、建立仓库：设置并</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> export CVSROOT </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;
    mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">变量，并设置仓库目录。比如创建</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;
    font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt"> /home/cvsroot </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;
    mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:
    宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">目录，并合理设置权限，在</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
    宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> .bash_profile </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;
    font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">中加入：</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
    宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">export CVSROOT=$HOME/cvsroot</span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;
    mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">；运行</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> cvs init</span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;
    mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">；设置让用户输入日志信息的默认的编辑器：</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;
    font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">export EDITOR=vim</span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;
    mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:
    宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">。如果使用的是网络，则</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
    宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> CVSROOT </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;
    font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">变量的形式是：</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> export
    CVSROOT=:exit:user@server:/path</span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;
    font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">，比如：</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
    宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">export
    CVSROOT=:exit:david@power/home/projects/repository <o:p></o:p></span></p>
    <p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
    宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">    b</span><span style="font-size:
    9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:
    Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">、导入文件或目录：</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">cvs import
    filename_or_directory vender_tag release_tag</span><span style="font-size:
    9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:
    Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">；这三个参数的含义是：在仓库中这些导入的文件所在的目录、供应商标记、发行标记。比如</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> cvs import step1 david start</span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;
    mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">。导入时的</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> N </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;
    mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">表示所导入的文件都是新文件。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;
    font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt"> <o:p></o:p></span></p>
    <p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
    宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">    c</span><span style="font-size:
    9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:
    Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">、使用时导出文件，用：</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">cvs checkout directory_name</span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;
    mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">；参数含义是仓库中所在的目录。建立新的目录，而不是获取他人的改动</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
    宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> <o:p></o:p></span></p>
    <p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
    宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">    d</span><span style="font-size:
    9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:
    Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">、对文件修改后，保存修改到仓库：</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">cvs commit</span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;
    mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> <o:p></o:p></span></p>
    <p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
    宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">    e</span><span style="font-size:
    9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:
    Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">、如果要获得他人的修改，使用</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> cvs update</span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;
    mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">，</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">U </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;
    mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">表示本地的一个文件已经被更新。如果已经对文件进行了修改，而此是他人已经修改了该文件并提交，</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
    宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">cvs </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;
    font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">将告诉用户发生冲突和冲突的位置。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> <o:p></o:p></span></p>
    <p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
    宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">    f</span><span style="font-size:
    9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:
    Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">、添加一个文件：</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">cvs add filename; cvs commit</span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;
    mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> <o:p></o:p></span></p>
    <p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
    宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">    g</span><span style="font-size:
    9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:
    Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">、删除一个文件：先在本地删除，然后使用</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> cvs remove file_name; cvs
    commit</span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
    Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> <o:p></o:p></span></p>
    <p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span style="font-size:
    9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:
    Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">三、使用标记</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> <o:p></o:p></span></p>
    <p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
    宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">    </span><span style="font-size:
    9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:
    Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">可以使用标记记录某个时刻文件的内容，这在制作发行版本的过程中非常有用：</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> <o:p></o:p></span></p>
    <p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
    宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">    cvs tag release1.0 <o:p></o:p></span></p>
    <p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
    宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">    </span><span style="font-size:
    9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:
    Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">改动后发现不正常，重新获得这个版本，则使用：</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">cvs checkout -r release1.0 <o:p></o:p></span></p>
    <p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span style="font-size:
    9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:
    Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">四、测试性代码：</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> <o:p></o:p></span></p>
    <p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
    宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">    </span><span style="font-size:
    9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:
    Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">当其中一个开发者对代码进行改进，但未来结果不能确定时，可以使用</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> cvs </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;
    mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">产生出一个代码的分之，这并不改变主控代码：</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;
    font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">cvs tag -b for_test</span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:
    宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:
    宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">。导出该代码的命令是：</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
    宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">cvs checkout -r for_test example</span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;
    mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">。由于在已有的目录树中不会使用该分之，因此必须重新建立目录树。如果测试成功，则要求将主控代码和测试代码合并，则先导出主控代码，然后合并：</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> <o:p></o:p></span></p>

    mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">变量一般遵循一套统一的命名规范以很容易的决定如何创建和安装程序（和其他派生对象）。给规范还支持</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;

    "Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> <o:p></o:p></span></p>
    <p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
    宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">    </span><span style="font-size:
    9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:
    Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">在</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">make</span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;
    mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">时，一些变量被用于决定那些对象要被创建。写变量叫做</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:

    mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:
    宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">。例如，</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;
    font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">PROGRAM</span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
    Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">变量包括一个要被编译和连接的程序列表。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;

    宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">    </span><span style="font-size:
    9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:
    Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">另一个变量集用于决定被创建变量被安装到哪里。这些变量以相应的主变量命名，但加一个前缀，表示那些标准目录应被用作安装路径。这些标准目录的名称规定在</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">GNU</span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;
    mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">标准中。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">Automake</span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;
    mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">用</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">pkglibdir</span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;
    mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:

    mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">和</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> pkgdatadir</span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;
    mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">来展开这一列表。他们和没有</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;
    font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">pkg</span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:

    0pt">前缀的版本一样，只不过有</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:
    "Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">‘@PACHAGE@’</span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;

    mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:

    <p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
    宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">    </span><span style="font-size:
    9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:
    Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">对每一个主变量，有一个</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">EXTRA_</span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;
    mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">前缀的变量。这个变量用于列出所有对象，至于哪些变量被创建，哪些变量不被创建则取决于</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
    宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">configure</span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;
    font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">。之所以需要这个变量，是因为</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">Automake</span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;
    mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">必须静态的指导要创建对象的完整列表以便生成一个</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;
    font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">‘Makefile</span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;
    mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:

    font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">in’</span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
    Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:

    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> <o:p></o:p></span></p>
    <p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
    宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">    </span><span style="font-size:
    9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:
    Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">例如，</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">cpio </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;
    mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">在</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">configure</span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;
    mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">时决定创建那些程序。一些程序被安装在</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;
    font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">bindir</span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
    Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">，一些被安装在</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:
    "Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">sbindir</span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;
    mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">：</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> <o:p></o:p></span></p>
    <p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
    宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">    EXTRA_PROGRAMS = mt rmt <o:p></o:p></span></p>
    <p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
    宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">    bin_PROGRAMS = cpoi pax <o:p></o:p></span></p>
    <p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
    宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">    sbin_PRGRAMS = @PROGRAMS@ <o:p></o:p></span></p>
    <p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:

    9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:
    Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">定义没有前缀的主变量是错误的（如：</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">PROGRAMS</span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;
    mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">）。值得注意的是，</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:
    "Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">“dir”</span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;
    mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">在作为构成变量名时会被忽略。一次，我们写成</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;
    font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">bin_PROGRAMS </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;
    mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:
    宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">而不是</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;
    font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">bindir_PROGRAMS. <o:p></o:p></span></p>
    <p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
    宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">    </span><span style="font-size:

    0pt">做为这次修改的结果，至于原始软件包，可以不必保存。等到下次需要再修改的时候，可以用</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:

    0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>
    <p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;

    </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
    Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">　　单个文件的版本控制</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:

    mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">管理，适合对少量文件进行版本控制，不适合小组进行项目协作开发。优点：使用简便；缺点：功能有限。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">RCS</span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;
    mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">常用命令有</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">ci/co/rcsdiff</span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;

    0pt">。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> <o:p></o:p></span></p>

    Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">　　</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">rcs</span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;
    mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">用一个后缀为</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">“,v”</span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;
    mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">的文件保存一文件的内容和所有修改的历史信息，你可以随时取出任意一个版本，用</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
    宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">rcs</span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:

    宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">保存程序就不必为不同版本分别备份。下面是一个</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
    宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">“,v”</span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;
    font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">文件的例子：</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> <o:p></o:p></span></p>

    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> <o:p></o:p></span></p>

    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">rcs</span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;
    mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">文件里记载了每次更新的日期、作者、还有更新说明（</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;
    font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">Log</span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
    Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">）。文件的最新版本内容放在</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;
    font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">Log</span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
    Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">之后，再后面是历次版本与其后一版本的差别，按</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;
    font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">check in</span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:

    0pt">check out</span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;

    mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:

    宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">该程序只是简单地录一小段纯音频数据存储在</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:

    font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:

    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">就可以播放出来。因为程序要读写声卡的设备文件</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;

    {<br>
      int id,fd,i,j;<br>
      char testbuf[4096];<br>

      //</span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
    Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">这里使用声卡驱动程序</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:

    宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">  if(id<0||fd<0){<br>
        printf("error in open the device!\n");<br>

      } <o:p></o:p></span></p>

    0pt">，顾名思义，是个可以用在小组协作环境下的源码版本管理系统。同类的软件有</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:

    0pt">被定义，这个符号激活一些宏特性。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;
    font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt"><br>

    </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
    Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">选项产生位置独立的代码。由于库是在运行的时候被调入，因此这个</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
    宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><br>
                        
    </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
    Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">选项是必需的，因为在编译的时候，装入内存的地址还不知道。如果</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
    宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><br>
                        
    </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
    Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">不使用这个选项，库文件可能不会正确运行。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;
    font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt"><br>
    -shared             
    </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
    Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">选项告诉编译器产生共享库代码。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;
    font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt"><br>
    -Wl,-soname          -Wl </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;
    mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">告诉编译器将后面的参数传递到连接器。而</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;
    font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt"> -soname </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;
    mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:
    宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">指定了</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;
    font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt"><br>
                        
    </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
    Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">共享库的</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> soname</span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;
    mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;

    宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><br>
        </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;
    mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:
    宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">＃</span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:
    "Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;
    mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">可以把库文件拷贝到</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:
    "Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">
    /etc/ld.so.conf </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;
    mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:
    宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">中列举出的任何目录中，并以</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
    宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><br>
    root </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
    Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">身份运行</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> ldconfig</span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;
    mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">；或者</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><br>
        </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;
    mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:
    宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">＃</span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:
    "Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;
    mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">运行</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> export LD_LIBRARY_PATH='pwd'</span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;
    mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">，它把当前路径加到库搜索路径中去。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;
    font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt"> <o:p></o:p></span></p>
    <p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
    宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><br>
    3  </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
    Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">使用高级共享库特性</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:
    "Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><br>
    1> ldd </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
    Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">工具</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><br>
    ldd </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
    Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">用来显示执行文件需要哪些共享库</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;
    font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">, </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
    Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">共享库装载管理器在哪里找到了需要的共享库</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;
    font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">. <o:p></o:p></span></p>
    <p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
    宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">2> soname <o:p></o:p></span></p>
    <p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span style="font-size:
    9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:
    Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">共享库的一个非常重要的，也是非常难的概念是</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> soname--</span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;
    mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">简写共享目标名（</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:
    "Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">short
    for shared object name</span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;
    mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:
    宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">）。这是一个为共享库（</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
    宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">.so</span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:
    宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:
    宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">）文件而内嵌在控制数据中的名字。如前面提到的，每一个程序都有一个需要使用的库的清单。这个清单的内容是一系列库的</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> soname</span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;
    mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">，如同</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> ldd </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;
    mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">显示的那样，共享库装载器必须找到这个清单。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;
    font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt"> <o:p></o:p></span></p>
    <p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
    宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">soname </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;
    font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">的关键功能是它提供了兼容性的标准。当要升级系统中的一个库时，并且新库的</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> soname </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;
    mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">和老的库的</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> soname </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;
    mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">一样，用旧库连接生成的程序，使用新的库依然能正常运行。这个特性使得在</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
    宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> Linux </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;
    font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">下，升级使用共享库的程序和定位错误变得十分容易。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> <o:p></o:p></span></p>
    <p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span style="font-size:
    9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:
    Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">在</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> Linux </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;
    mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">中，应用程序通过使用</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:
    "Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> soname</span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;
    mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">，来指定所希望库的版本。库作者也可以通过保留或者改变</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:
    9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt"> soname </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
    Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">来声明，哪些版本是相互兼容的，这使得程序员摆脱了共享库版本冲突问题的困扰。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
    宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> <o:p></o:p></span></p>
    <p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span style="font-size:
    9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:
    Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">查看</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">/usr/local/lib </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;
    mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">目录，分析</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> MiniGUI </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;
    mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">的共享库文件之间的关系</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:
    "Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> <o:p></o:p></span></p>
    <p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
    宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">3> </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;
    font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">共享库装载器</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> <o:p></o:p></span></p>
    <p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span style="font-size:
    9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:
    Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">当程序被调用的时候，</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">Linux </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;
    mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">共享库装载器（也被称为动态连接器）也自动被调用。它的作用是保证程序所需要的所有适当版本的库都被调入内存。共享库装载器名字是</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> ld.so </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;
    mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">或者是</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> ld-linux.so</span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;
    mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">，这取决于</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> Linux libc </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;
    mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">的版本，它必须使用一点外部交互，才能完成自己的工作。然而它接受在环境变量和配置文件中的配置信息。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> <o:p></o:p></span></p>
    <p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span style="font-size:
    9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:
    Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">文件</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> /etc/ld.so.conf </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;
    mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">定义了标准系统库的路径。共享库装载器把它作为搜索路径。为了改变这个设置，必须以</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
    宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> root </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;
    font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">身份运行</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
    宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> ldconfig </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;
    font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">工具。这将更新</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> /etc/ls.so.cache </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;
    mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">文件，这个文件其实是装载器内部使用的文件之一。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;
    font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt"> <o:p></o:p></span></p>
    <p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span style="font-size:
    9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:
    Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">可以使用许多环境变量控制共享库装载器的操作（表</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">1-4+</span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;
    mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">）。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> <o:p></o:p></span></p>
    <p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
    宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">                       
    </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
    Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">表</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> 1-4+ </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;
    mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">共享库装载器环境变量</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:
    "Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><br>
    </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
    Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">变量</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">                      
    </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
    Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">含义</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><br>
    LD_AOUT_LIBRARY_PATH       </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;
    mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">除了不使用</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> a.out </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;
    mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">二进制格式外，与</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:
    "Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">
    LD_LIBRARY_PATH </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;
    mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:
    宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">相同。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;
    font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt"><br>
    LD_AOUT_PRELOAD           
    </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
    Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">除了不使用</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> a.out </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;
    mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">二进制格式外，与</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:
    "Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">
    LD_PRELOAD </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
    Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">相同。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><br>
    LD_KEEPDIR                
    </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
    Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">只适用于</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> a.out </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;
    mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">库；忽略由它们指定的目录。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;
    font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt"><br>
    LD_LIBRARY_PATH           
    </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
    Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">将其他目录加入库搜索路径。它的内容应该是由冒号</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;
    font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt"><br>
                              
    </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
    Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">分隔的目录列表，与可执行文件的</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;
    font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt"> PATH </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
    Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">变量具有相同的格式。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:
    "Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><br>
                              
    </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
    Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">如果调用设置用户</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:
    "Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> ID </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;
    mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">或者进程</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> ID </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;
    mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">的程序，该变量被忽略。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:
    "Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><br>
    LD_NOWARN                 
    </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
    Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">只适用于</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> a.out </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;
    mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">库；当改变版本号是，发出警告信息。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;
    font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt"><br>
    LD_PRELOAD                
    </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
    Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">首先装入用户定义的库，使得它们有机会覆盖或者重新定义标准库。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
    宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><br>
                              
    </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
    Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">使用空格分开多个入口。对于设置用户</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;
    font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt"> ID </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
    Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">或者进程</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> ID </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;
    mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">的程序，</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;

    </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
    Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">只有被标记过的库才被首先装入。在</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;
    font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt"> /etc/ld.so.perload </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:
    宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:
    宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">中指定</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;
    font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt"><br>
                              
    </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
    Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">了全局版本号，该文件不遵守这个限制。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;
    font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:

    <p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:

    0pt">使用</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> dlopen <o:p></o:p></span></p>
    <p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
    宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">    </span><span style="font-size:
    9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:
    Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">另外一个强大的库函数是</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> dlopen()</span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;
    mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">。该函数将打开一个新库，并把它装入内存。该函数主要用来加载库中的符号，这些符号在编译的时候是不知道的。比如</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> Apache Web </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;
    mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">服务器利用这个函数在运行过程中加载模块，这为它提供了额外的能力。一个配置文件控制了加载模块的过程。这种机制使得在系统中添加或者删除一个模块时，都不需要重新编译了。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> <o:p></o:p></span></p>
    <p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
    宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">    </span><span style="font-size:
    9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:
    Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">可以在自己的程序中使用</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> dlopen()</span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;
    mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">dlopen() </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;
    mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">在</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> dlfcn.h </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;
    mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">中定义，并在</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> dl </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;
    mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">库中实现。它需要两个参数：一个文件名和一个标志。文件名可以是我们学习过的库中的</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
    宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> soname</span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;
    font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">。标志指明是否立刻计算库的依赖性。如果设置为</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> RTLD_NOW </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;
    mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">的话，则立刻计算；如果设置的是</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;
    font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt"> RTLD_LAZY</span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;
    mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:
    宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">，则在需要的时候才计算。另外，可以指定</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
    宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> RTLD_GLOBAL</span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;
    font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">，它使得那些在以后才加载的库可以获得其中的符号。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> <o:p></o:p></span></p>
    <p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
    宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">    </span><span style="font-size:
    9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:
    Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">当库被装入后，可以把</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> dlopen() </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;
    mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">返回的句柄作为给</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:
    "Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> dlsym()
    </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
    Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">的第一个参数，以获得符号在库中的地址。使用这个地址，就可以获得库中特定函数的指针，并且调用装载库中的相应函数。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;

    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>
    <p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><br>
       Linux </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;
    mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:
    宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">是一个多用户系统，因此对用户的管理是系统管理的基本组成部分。安装</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> Linux </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;
    mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">的用户很可能就是该系统的管理员，也就是权限最高的</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;
    font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt"> root</span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
    Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">。通过对用户的管理，分清了用户之间的责、权、利，保证了系统安全。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
    宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> <o:p></o:p></span></p>
    <p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span style="font-size:
    9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:
    Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">对软件的评价：代码的稳定性、友好性、代码的易读性、统一的风格、技巧。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> <o:p></o:p></span></p>
    <p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
    宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">    1</span><span style="font-size:
    9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:
    Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">。尽量少的使用全局变量</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> <o:p></o:p></span></p>
    <p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
    宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">    2</span><span style="font-size:
    9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:
    Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">。局部变量一定要初始化，特别是指针变量</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> <o:p></o:p></span></p>
    <p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
    宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">    3</span><span style="font-size:
    9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:
    Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">。成员函数功能单一，不要过分追求技巧，函数体不要过长。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> <o:p></o:p></span></p>
    <p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:

    {i = i + j;      {int k = i; <o:p></o:p></span></p>

    Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">。设计函数时考虑到通用性</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> <o:p></o:p></span></p>
    <p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:

    9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:
    Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">。申请内存时，一定先要释放。注意</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> if </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;

    0pt">问题。</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> <o:p></o:p></span></p>
    <p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:

    9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:
    Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">。对浮点数比较大小时注意不要使用</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;

    <p class="MsoNormal" align="center" style="text-align:center;mso-pagination:
    widow-orphan"><a name="I351"></a><b><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:18.0pt;

    "Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><o:p></o:p></span></p>
    <p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><br>
    GNU </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
    Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">编码标准</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
