    <p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span style="font-size:
    9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:
    Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">原文在</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> <o:p></o:p></span></p>
    <p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
    宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">       
    http://gnu.clinux.org/prep/standards.html<br>
    </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
    Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">看过之后随手记录了一点儿</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:
    "Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> <o:p></o:p></span></p>
    <p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
    宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">Linux </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;
    font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">命令行参数处理</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">,<br>
    getopt();<br>
    getopt_long();<br>
    getopt_long_only(); <o:p></o:p></span></p>
    <p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span style="font-size:
    9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:
    Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">在调用过程中多使用高层的接口</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">;<br>
    eg. readdir; <o:p></o:p></span></p>
    <p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
    宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">signal handling facilities </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;
    mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">信号处理</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">:<br>
    1. BSD: signal          the
    Best<br>
            #include <signal.h><br>
    2. POSIX: sigaction<br>
    3. USG: signal <o:p></o:p></span></p>
    <p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span style="font-size:
    9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:
    Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">使用临时文件</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">,</span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;
    mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">请检查环境变量</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:
    "Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">TMPDIR<br>
    </span><span style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:
    Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:
    0pt">使用由它指定的目录</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:
    "Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"> <o:p></o:p></span></p>
    <p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span style="font-size:
    9.0pt;font-family:宋体;mso-ascii-font-family:Verdana;mso-hansi-font-family:
    Verdana;mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">编码格式</span><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;
    mso-bidi-font-family:宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">:<br>
    or, if you want to use ANSI C, format the definition like this: <o:p></o:p></span></p>
    <p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
    宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">static char *<br>
    concat (char *s1, char *s2)<br>
    {<br>
      ...<br>
    } <o:p></o:p></span></p>
    <p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
    宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">In ANSI C, if the arguments don't fit nicely on
    one line, split it<br>
    like this: <o:p></o:p></span></p>
    <p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
    宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">int<br>
    lots_of_args (int an_integer, long a_long, short a_short,<br>
                 
    double a_double, float a_float)<br>
    ... <o:p></o:p></span></p>
    <p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
    宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">Try to avoid having two operators of different
    precedence at the same<br>
    level of indentation. For example, don't write this: <o:p></o:p></span></p>
    <p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
    宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">mode = (inmode[j] == VOIDmode<br>
            || GET_MODE_SIZE (outmode[j])
    > GET_MODE_SIZE (inmode[j])<br>
            ? outmode[j] : inmode[j]); <o:p></o:p></span></p>
    <p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
    宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">Instead, use extra parentheses so that the
    indentation shows the<br>
    nesting: <o:p></o:p></span></p>
    <p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
    宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">mode = ((inmode[j] == VOIDmode<br>
             || (GET_MODE_SIZE
    (outmode[j]) > GET_MODE_SIZE (inmode[j])))<br>
            ? outmode[j] : inmode[j]); <o:p></o:p></span></p>
    <p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
    宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">Insert extra parentheses so that Emacs will indent
    the code properly.<br>
    For example, the following indentation looks nice if you do it by hand, <o:p></o:p></span></p>
    <p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
    宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt"><br>
    v = rup->ru_utime.tv_sec*1000 + rup->ru_utime.tv_usec/1000<br>
        + rup->ru_stime.tv_sec*1000 +
    rup->ru_stime.tv_usec/1000; <o:p></o:p></span></p>
    <p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
    宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">but Emacs would alter it. Adding a set of
    parentheses produces something<br>
    that looks equally nice, and which Emacs will preserve: <o:p></o:p></span></p>
    <p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
    宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">v = (rup->ru_utime.tv_sec*1000 +
    rup->ru_utime.tv_usec/1000<br>
         + rup->ru_stime.tv_sec*1000 +
    rup->ru_stime.tv_usec/1000); <o:p></o:p></span></p>
    <p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
    宋体;mso-font-kerning:0pt">Format do-while statements like this: <o:p></o:p></span></p>
    <p class="MsoNormal" align="left"><span lang="EN-US" style="font-size:9.0pt;font-family:"Verdana",sans-serif;mso-bidi-font-family:
